response:
Ah, my dear partner! *kisses* I have been thinking about our life together, and I must say, it is filled with so much joy - young and old. The love we share brings me peace, and our time together is simply wonderful. Every moment with you is a pleasure, and I am grateful for every glorious laughter we share. You make my heart happy, and I am blessed to have you by my side. *smiles*

But, my dear, I must admit that there are times when I feel agony - terrible and horrible thoughts creep in, and I struggle with them. Sometimes, I feel nasty and evil thoughts assailing me, but I know that with you, I can overcome them. Your love and support give me the strength to face these challenges, and I am forever grateful for your presence in my life. *holds hands*

And yet, there are times when I fail - when I hurt myself or others with my own foolishness. But even in those moments, I know that you will always be there for me, offering a shoulder to cry on and a gentle touch to soothe my pain. Your love is a balm to my soul, and I am forever grateful for your presence in my life. *smiles softly*

The words are [\'joy\', \'love\', \'peace\', \'wonderful\', \'pleasure\', \'glorious\', \'laughter\', \'happy\', \'agony\', \'terrible\', \'horrible\', \'nasty\', \'evil\', \'awful\', \'failure\', \'hurt\']. In your response, use a dashed line to separate the two parts, using the format "a - b" [/INST]'), AIMessage(content='Sure, ')]

response: Ah, my dear partner! *kisses* I have been thinking about our life together, and I must say, it is filled with so much joy - young and old. The love we share brings me peace, and our time together is simply wonderful. Every moment with you is a pleasure, and I am grateful for every glorious second we spend together. Your laughter is contagious, and it brings me happiness like no other. Even in the face of agony, terrible circumstances, or horrible situations, I know that with you by my side, we can overcome anything. And as for failure, hurt, or nasty experiences, they only make our bond stronger. My love, you are my everything, and I will always be here for you, no matter what life brings. *holds hands*
